snippet: On social media, many in Jordan and elsewhere said the news media’s reluctance to treat the shooting in North Carolina as a hate crime was evidence of anti-Muslim bias.
abstract: Jordanian news commentators call for killings of three young Muslims in North Carolina, two of whom were Jordanian citizens, to be treated as hate crimes and say murders should have wider coverage; contend reluctance to do so reveals Western bias against Muslims.
lead_paragraph: On social media, many in Jordan and elsewhere said the news media’s reluctance to treat the shooting in North Carolina as a hate crime was evidence of anti-Muslim bias.

headline.main: Jordanians See U.S. Reporting Bias in Coverage of Student Killings
headline.print_headline: Jordanians See U.S. Reporting Bias in Coverage of Student Killings
